file_content.text: The Gormak won't do any more digging in those tombs.
Remember: You'll put up with him no matter what he does. Or I'll be back.
Don't embarrass the Empire.
Consider this the reward for all your hard work, Sergeant.
Lucky you.
He's all yours.
Why do no outsiders listen?
Hmm... nothing rhymes with "vorantikus"....
You have done a great service, outsiders!
We owe you, outsider!
I will write an epic! You will be honored among the greatest heroes!
"From the stars, the strength of..." Hmm.
Thank you for dealing with that mess.
Thank you for your help, my lord. I know you're busy. Got things to do, people to... choke, probably.
Thank you for everything, my lord. I'm sure you're busy with... ah... something or other.
Thank you for your help, hunter. I'm sure you've got a full schedule of, uh... killing people ahead of you.
Thank you for all your assistance. This, ah... doesn't need to be mentioned to any officers, does it?
You're a lifesaver. Thank you for handling this.
"The might of the stars fell upon..." Sergeant, is "defilers" better than "savages"?
And he's staying. Wonderful.
May the Mystics see no shadows upon you!
